Auth.signInToManageProfile: Sign in to manage your profile.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.languageDescription: Select your preferred language for the interface.

Account.title: Account
Account.description: Manage your profile used across projects.
Account.usernameHint: Letters, numbers, underscores, dots (3‚Äì30 chars). Must be unique.
Account.avatarPreviewHint: Preview of the image that will appear in the header.

Workspaces.title: Workspaces
Workspaces.heading: Your workspaces
Workspaces.emptyMessage: No workspaces yet. Use the form above to start a new project for your next poem.
Workspaces.deleteConfirm: Delete this workspace? This cannot be undone.

Chats.title: Chats
Chats.heading: Chats in this workspace
Chats.description: Every conversation inside this workspace appears here. Keep your drafts, reviews, and reflections neatly organized.
Chats.noChats: No chats yet. Start one to begin translating.
Chats.deleteConfirm: Delete this chat? This cannot be undone.

Thread.title: Creative, decolonial translation
Thread.description: Build your translation line by line and keep every decision in one calm space.
Thread.workshopDescription: Generate options, compare them, choose, or ask for more
Thread.workshopNote: (NB: Translalia may make mistakes, as its ability with different kinds of language depends on the dataset of the LLM it is using)
Thread.notebookDescription: Compile and edit your version line by line
Thread.translationCompleteDescription: All {count} lines have been translated. Click Finish to complete your translation journey.

Guide.title: Let's get started
Guide.subtitle: Upload your poem and capture the brief before translating.
Guide.headerSubtitleReady: All set‚Äîhead to the workshop when you're ready.
Guide.headerSubtitleStart: Upload your poem and describe the translation intent to begin.
Guide.corpusDescription: Upload texts that represent the desired voice/style.
Guide.corpusHelpTooltip: Share backlist titles, comparable translations, or publications that capture the target voice.
Guide.sourceLanguageVarietyHelper: Writing is never just in 'a language', it is always in some kind of language ‚Äì a register, dialect or variety. What kind of language is your text written in?
Guide.sourceLanguageVarietyHelperNote: (NB Translalia sends instructions to LLMs, so its ability with different kinds of language depends on the dataset of the LLM it is using)
Guide.sourceLanguageVarietyExamples: Examples: Scouse English, Garhwali, Brazilian Portuguese, Middle English, informal register
Guide.sourceLanguageVarietyPlaceholder: e.g., Garhwali, Scouse English, Brazilian Portuguese, Middle English‚Ä¶
Guide.translationZoneHelper: And you are translating, not just into 'a language' but into a range or kind of language ‚Äì what we call your 'translation zone'. What zone of language do you want to translate into?
Guide.translationZoneHelperNote: (NB Translalia sends instructions to LLMs, so its ability with different kinds of language depends on the dataset of the LLM it is using)
Guide.translationZoneExamples: Examples: Modern Standard Hindi, Singlish, Rioplatense Spanish, a mix of French and Italian, medieval German, the whole range of world Englishes
Guide.translationZonePlaceholder: e.g., Contemporary Mexican Spanish with indigenous influences
Guide.translationIntentHelper: Briefly describe your intention or goal for the translation
Guide.translationIntentExamples: Examples: open up the source text's possible meanings, adopt a decolonial translation strategy, try out a range of voices, make the text accessible to children, bring out its humour
Guide.translationIntentPlaceholder: e.g., Preserve the rhythmic structure while finding contemporary equivalents
Guide.zoneErrorDescribe: Please describe the translation zone before saving.
Guide.zoneErrorThread: Open or create a workspace thread to save your zone.
Guide.zoneErrorSave: Failed to save. Please try again.
Guide.intentErrorDescribe: Please describe the translation intent before saving.
Guide.intentErrorThread: Open or create a workspace thread to save your intent.
Guide.intentErrorSave: Failed to save. Please try again.
Guide.segmentsDetected: {count} segments detected (~4 lines each, split at semantic boundaries). These are functional divisions for LLM processing, not literary divisions.
Guide.blankLinesDetected: Blank lines detected ‚Äî formatting will be preserved so segment boundaries stay intact.
Guide.validationError: Please fill in all required fields: Poem, Translation Zone, and Translation Intent
Guide.validationErrorThread: No thread ID found. Please refresh and try again.
Guide.validationErrorPoem: Poem and segments are missing. Please go back and enter your poem.
Guide.confirmDialogDescription: Your poem, translation zone, and translation intent are set. You can make changes anytime. Click 'Start Workshop' to begin translating.
Guide.translationRangeHelper: How wide a range of variants would you like to explore?
Guide.translationRangeRequired: Please select a translation range to continue
Guide.translationModelHelper: Choose which OpenAI model to use for translation processing

Notebook.title: Notebook
Notebook.assembleTranslationPlaceholder: Assemble your translation here‚Ä¶ (You can edit this directly)
Notebook.translationPlaceholder: Your complete translation will appear here...
Notebook.notesThreadPlaceholder: Write your reflections about the translation journey...
Notebook.notesSelectLine: Select a line in the notebook to add a note
Notebook.notesLinePlaceholder: Add a note for this line...

ContextNotes.educationalNote: These notes explain considerations‚Äînot which option is "best." Multiple valid translations exist!

JourneyReflection.title: Your Translation Reflection
JourneyReflection.description: Share your translation journey - how it felt, what you found interesting or challenging
JourneyReflection.reflectionPrompt: How did your translation journey feel? What was the most interesting or challenging part for you?
JourneyReflection.placeholder: Share your thoughts about your translation journey...
JourneyReflection.feedbackOffer: A helpful friend would like to comment
JourneyReflection.feedbackDescription: I can share some thoughts about your translation journey if you'd like. It's totally optional!
JourneyReflection.waitingMessage: This usually takes 10-20 seconds, thanks for waiting! üéâ
JourneyReflection.feedbackNote: This feedback is based on your reflection and translation journey.
JourneyReflection.reflectionSavedNoFeedback: Your reflection was saved, but we couldn't generate feedback right now.
